task_requirements:
Implement pre-configured Playwright fixtures for authenticated pages, API contexts, and test data.

**Tasks (T048-T056):**
- T048: Create fixture type definitions in core/typescript/fixtures/types.ts
- T049: Create base test fixture with config in core/typescript/fixtures/base.ts
- T050: Implement authenticatedPage fixture in core/typescript/fixtures/auth.ts
- T051: Implement dynamic role-specific page fixtures (adminPage, userPage) in core/typescript/fixtures/auth.ts
- T052: Implement apiContext fixture with auth headers in core/typescript/fixtures/api.ts
- T053: Implement runId fixture for test isolation in core/typescript/fixtures/data.ts
- T054: Implement testData fixture with cleanup registration in core/typescript/fixtures/data.ts
- T055: Create fixtures module barrel export (test, expect) in core/typescript/fixtures/index.ts
- T056: Write unit tests for fixture composition in core/typescript/fixtures/__tests__/fixtures.test.ts

**Checkpoint**: Fixtures complete - tests can use authenticatedPage, apiContext, testData, runId

**Dependencies**: US1 (Config) and US2 (Auth) are complete. Reference existing modules:
- core/typescript/config/ (config system)
- core/typescript/auth/ (storage state, credentials, providers)
- core/typescript/data/ (namespace, cleanup)
